title: (x) sans and serif face on letterhead - Adobe Garamond, Avenir {Stephen, Richard Weston}
content:
Help me, please  
here is a sample of the fonts needed.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [letterhead-fpo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150105030510/http:/typophile.com/files/letterhead-fpo.jpg) | 202.21 KB |
author: wandar

comments.content: Surely, Mr Speikermann, that's Mr Frutiger's Avenir rather than his namesake.
The italic looks like Janson... i think?

I think [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150105030510/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.120809.0.11&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Paul+M.+Brisson%2C+M.D.&sampleSize=28) is right. Helps if you reduce the size of the bitmappy image.
